level.heading: Waiver or renunciation of claim or right after default.
level.text: Any claim or right arising out of an alleged default or breach of warranty may be discharged in whole or in part without consideration by a written waiver or renunciation signed and delivered by the aggrieved party.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-128
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-128, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28:2A-101.
